group_1.textCenter: (It might be my fault that the situation's gotten so complicated...)
(Because I became a Diviner without Mikoshiba's permission...)
(And I was punished by being forced to kill @someone...)

group_1.textLeft: What!? She already became a Diviner!?

group_1.textRight: It's not Sunao's fault, though, we swear!
We're the ones to blame for not telling her about Diviners...!

group_1.textLeft: Have ye forgotten that your family was born of a Tokime branch family!?

group_1.textRight: We are fully aware of that...!

group_1.textLeft: If so, things should never have gotten to this point.
Your awareness of the clan may be weak, certainly, @but you have a daughter entering the age of @menarche!
You kept this from her on purpose for some reason, didn't ye...?

group_1.textRight: We didn't want her to develop an interest in them. In Diviners...
Mom and Dad did nothing wrong!
It was me. I made a wish and became a Magical Girl @on my own.

group_1.textLeft: Is that what they're called out there, these days?
Then, what did thou wish for?

group_1.textRight: Is it so bad to make a wish for the people you love!?

group_1.textLeft: I'm saying that one of the Tokime bloodline must not make such a wish.

group_1.narration: "Thou must atone for thine and thy parents' crime
"Even if thou hast become a Diviner wastefully,
there are mountains of things thou canst do in the village."
"If anyone who disobeys our will doth appear,

group_1.textCenter: "Kill others to atone for your crime,
or thy parents die to atone for your crime.
Two choices, but in essence, only one."

group_1.textRight: (But if we take care of the Devil fast enough, maybe I can save Mom and Dad too...)
